listTitle: Stuff to try (this is a list)

cards.title: This is a card. Drag it onto "Tried It" to show it's done.
Cards do many cool things. Click on this card to open it and learn more...
cards.description: - Click Edit if you'd like to add or edit a card's description. You can also change the card's title (just click it!).\n- Use the buttons on the right to add pictures, labels, checklists and more.\n- The attached picture is Taco, the most famous Siberian Husky in New York City, and official spokes-mascot for Trello. You might see him around Trello introducing new features and whatnot.

cards.title: Add all the cards and lists you need.
There's lots more magic...
cards.description: Learn how to use Trello to live with perspective: https://trello.com/guide\nThere’s so many amazing ways to use Trello. [Get inspired!](https://trello.com/inspiration)
